RetroArch Nightly F-Droid Repo

This is a RetroArch nightly repository compatible with F-Droid. Applications in this repository are official binaries built by the original application developers.

Currently it serves 1 apps. To add it to your F-Droid client, scan the QR code (click it to enlarge) or use this URL:

https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Vinfall/fdroid-server/main/fdroid/repo

If you would like to manually verify the fingerprint (SHA-256) of the repository signing key, here it is:
C3 A7 B8 14 5F B8 72 B6 7C 48 E7 BA 9E 6A 07 9E 58 2D DC F5 AA FD 00 F6 14 3E 91 B8 F4 51 87 F6
